ValidationRule.description: Prevent edit record when status = submitted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(OR(Contains(RecordType.Name,'Master Campaign'),(Contains(RecordType.Name,'Commercial')),
(Contains(RecordType.Name,'Dummy Campaign')))) ,
IF( OR(Ischanged(Status), Ischanged(Approvedflag__c)), FALSE, OR(TEXT(Parent.Status) = 'Submitted', TEXT(Parent.Status) = '1-Approved')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Campaign cannot be modified during approval process.
